div.class: contact__wrapper white-bg mt--70 p-relative z-index-1 wow fadeInUp

li.p: Riyadh-Saudi Arabia, 8000 King Fahad Road, OlayaDisc 4055

div.class: section__title-wrapper section__title-wrapper-3 text-center section-padding-3 mb-80 wow fadeInUp
div.p: The electronic invoicing system is a procedure that aims to transform the process of issuing paper bills and notices into an electronic process that allows the exchange of invoices, debit and credit notices and processing them in an electronic format in an organized electronic format between the buyer and the seller.

div.class: col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 wow fadeInUp
col-xxl-6 col-xl-6 col-lg-6 col-md-6 wow fadeInUp

div.p: In 3-steps for the first phase starting December 4th, 2021

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 wow fadeInUp

div.p: No hassle of writing manual invoices anymore

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 wow fadeInUp

div.p: Use a complaint e-invoicing system that meets the requirements.

div.class: col-xxl-4 col-xl-4 col-lg-4 col-md-6 wow fadeInUp

div.p: E-Invoices include all the requirements of a tax invoice.

div.class: cta__inner p-relative fix z-index-1 wow fadeInUp

div.h3:
